response.job_title: Project Engineering | SAP | Project Estimation | Power BI | AutoCAD |  DIALux | MATLAB  | Renewable Energy Management  | Value Engineering
response.summary:
Systematic Electrical Engineer with over 8 years of experience in managing electrical project lifecycle from design phase to delivery and implementation. Polished in analyzing, troubleshooting, and developing solutions. Consistently delivers engineering services to meet company, customer, and statutory and regulatory specifications on time and within budget. 

Excellent analytical abilities and knowledge of how to use tools and information to solve problems and develop projects. With worldwide experience, education abroad, and excellent French and English proficiency. 

Effective utilization of Microsoft Office, AutoCAD, MATLAB, Power World, Latex, and SAP. Organized and dependable candidate successful at managing multiple priorities with a positive attitude.
response.skills: Leadership Development, Decision-Making, Dialux, AutoCAD, •	Value Engineering, SAP ERP, Interpersonal Skills, Teamwork, Microsoft Excel, Ingeniería, Gestión de proyectos, Microsoft Office, Liderazgo de equipos, Análisis, Energía, Inglés, Personal Development, Life Skills, Big Data, Microsoft Power Query

profile_positions.description:
•	Implement an asset management strategy for the country's Eastern and Central Power Transmission Centers' electric lines and substations, supervising the process to ensure proper risk, cost, and performance management.
•	Help define the medium- and long-term strategy for power line and substation maintenance, which contributed to meeting project service quality and OPEX targets.
•	Presented a paper at the XXIII International Congress on Maintenance and Asset Management, May 26-28, 2021, titled "Implementation of ISO 55001 at ISA Intercolombia and its impact on the cultural transformation of the company."
•	Execute the consolidation and monitoring of the annual and quarterly budgets for the costs and expenses of the execution of maintenance orders, as well as the formulation of the long-term financial plan for the operating assets of the National Transmission System.
•	Direct efforts to enhance and modernize the Power Transmission System's preventative, predictive, condition, and risk-based maintenance procedures via Reliability Centered Maintenance (RCM), Root Cause Analysis (RCA), Elimination of Cause Risk (ECR), and continuous improvement.
profile_positions.title: Maintenance Management Analyst

profile_positions.description:
•	Acquired technical and human competencies through proactive training in many company departments, developing a holistic understanding of the transmission industry.
•	Interacted with project execution, operation studies, disturbance analysis, power system control and supervision, planning, execution, and evaluation of high-voltage line and substation maintenance to learn about Colombia's energy transmission business.
•	Selected on a national level to take part in the Semillero de Talento program offered by the ISA, this is an early attraction program aimed at high potential talent.
profile_positions.title: Development Professional

profile_positions.description:
•	Determined and scheduled priorities as required to progress engineering work.
•	Provided on-site engineering and technical services during installation and fielding processes.
•	Recommended improvements for design, construction means and materials based on field or changing conditions.
•	Proposed electrical product and system modifications to improve quality and efficiency.
profile_positions.title: Project Engineer

profile_positions.description:
•	Developed the specifications for the quantities of materials and budgets for the rural medium and low voltage networks, as well as the design and typing of the designs.
•	Conducted engineering studies on design for products, associated and subsystems components and structures.
•	Drafted documentation detailing design requirements and technical specifications.
•	Performed complex calculations to analyze and optimize engineering processes.
•	Conducted technical evaluations of engineering designs and test results.
profile_positions.title: Design Engineer

profile_positions.description:
•	Created a business plan, as well as studies on logistics, marketing, and communication, in preparation for the establishment and growth of the CryoCapCell Company.
•	Awarded an international academic exchange to study abroad at the Ecole Supérieure Nationale des Arts et Métiers, ParisTech, in France during the 2012–2013 academic year for being one of the students in the Universidad Nacional de Colombia's "Best Averages" program.
profile_positions.title: Engineering Intern

school.name: Arts et Métiers ParisTech - École Nationale Supérieure d'Arts et Métiers

education.degree_name: Course of Management, Law, Finances, Market research, Industrial engineering and logistic knowledge.

company.name: ISA INTERCOLOMBIA
company.description:
Somos ISA INTERCOLOMBIA, empresa de ISA dedicada al transporte de energía eléctrica a alto voltaje en el país, que surge como resultado del proceso de actualización estratégica que separó en ISA este negocio del rol de matriz. 
 
Somos una empresa de servicios públicos mixta, constituida como sociedad anónima, encargada de administrar, operar y mantener los activos eléctricos propiedad de ISA en Colombia.
 
Somos el mayor transportador de energía en el país con cubrimiento nacional. Nuestras redes de transporte de energía se extienden a través de la diversa geografía nacional, aportando al desarrollo y a la competitividad de los colombianos.
